text: Small Town Singers is a musical group in Söderköping in Sweden. The group was established in 1967. They several sevral Svensktoppen successes during the mid-late 1970s and early 1980s. Sometimes, they still appear for sporadical performances. ==Svensktoppen charting songs== *"Hemlängtan" (one week, 1974) *"Dansen på Sunnanö" (elva veckor, 1974) *"Som stjärnor små" (one week, 1975) *"En sjömansvisa" (three weeks, 1975) *"Fritiofs avsked" (eleven weeks, 1975) *"Utövisan" (seven weeks, 1977) *"Sommarbrevet" (ten weeks, 1979) *"Jag gör så att blommorna blommar" (tio veckor, 1979) *"Jag har vandrat mina stigar" (three weeks, 1981) == References == Category:Musical groups established in 1967 Category:Swedish musical groups
title: Small Town Singers
